name: 2024 2nd International Conference on Power and Renewable Energy Engineering
content: Publication: All submissions will be sent for double-blind review. Accepted papers with registration and presentation will be published in Conference Proceedings by IEEE, which will be included in IEEE Xplore and indexed by EI Compendex and Scopus, etc.
organizers: Tohoku University, Japan, Tokai University, Japan, IEEE and IEEE PES
